PHRASE.LANG: The complete outfit bundle of the mighty pirate Guybrush Threepwood... Mr. Spicecake, or Droopface, or whatever your name is. Includes Guybrush's Shirt, Pants, and Shoes. [#Legal]

Voici le baluchon complet de la tenue du puissant pirate Guybrush Threepwood... M. Spicecake, ou Droopface, ou peu importe votre nom. Contient la chemise, le pantalon et les chaussures de Guybrush. [#Legal]
Das komplette Outfit des mächtigen Piraten Guybrush Threepwood... Herr Gewürztraminer oder Schlaffbacke oder wie auch immer du heißt. Beinhaltet Guybrushs Hemd, Hose und Schuhe. [#Legal]
Il pacchetto del completo del potente pirata Guybrush Threepwood… Mr. Spicecake, o Droopface, o qualunque sia il suo nome. Include Maglietta, Pantaloni e Scarpe da Guybrush. [#Legal]

El paquete completo del conjunto del gran pirata Guybrush Threepwood… Señor Tarta de Especias, o señor cara gacho, o como te llames. Incluye la camisa, los pantalones y los zapatos de Guybrush. [#Legal]
The complete outfit bundle of the mighty pirate Guybrush Threepwood... Mr. Spicecake, or Droopface, or whatever your name is. [#Legal]
